name: Al Quddus
description: Al Quddus, meaning 'The Most Sacred' or 'The Most Holy', is one of the names (Asmaâ€™ul Husna) of Allah in Islam.
summary: The name Al Quddus emphasizes the purity and sanctity of Allah. It signifies that Allah is free from any imperfection and holds perfect holiness. This name is often invoked in prayers and supplications to highlight the divine essence of purity and to seek closeness to Allah through recognition of His holiness.
